name: Deep Under (mishierukun)
description:
*Please play the game under resolution "1920 x 1080". *

This a game about the main character who suddenly awakes in an unfamiliar place with none of his memories.

You will need to find the items needed to unlock the elevator in order to go deeper to find a way out.

Controls

A : moving left

D : moving right

E : interact

I : inventory

Esc : Pause

Graphic and level designer: @mishierukun

Programmer: @Kinoe

Music and SE: https://soundeffect-lab.info/sound/various/ and https://maou.audio/
